subject: npmx Weekly #3
headline: npmx Weekly #3
intro: Exciting developments are underway! Dive into the latest enhancements and community milestones shaping our project.

topics.title: Performance Enhancements
topics.summary: Recent merges focus on optimizing the Algolia search functionality, leading to faster searches and a more efficient user experience.

topics.title: Security Features
topics.summary: New features now detect npm publish security downgrades and display fixed vulnerability versions, bolstering protection for users.

topics.title: Community Engagement Milestone
topics.summary: The npmx community has achieved a remarkable milestone, with 1000 contributions in a short time, showcasing our collaborative spirit.
